text.en: Oṃ svasti!
text.en-trans: om swasti

text.en: Guide for this fortunate age, crowning glory of the Śākya clan,
text.en-trans: kalzang nam dren tönpa shakyé tok

text.en: Khenpo Bodhisattva, Master Padmasambhava, Dharma-King Tri Songdetsen and the other two great ancestral rulers,
text.en-trans: khen lop chö sum mé wön nampa sum

text.en: Beacon of the Buddhadharma, Atiśa, and the rest—
text.en-trans: tenpé drönmé ati sha la sok

text.en: To all you peerless, most excellent of masters, we pray!
text.en-trans: da mé kyé chok nam la solwa dep

text.en: Thönmi Sambhoṭa, the first to translate from Sanskrit into Tibetan,
text.en-trans: pak bö tokmé lotsa tu mi jé

text.en: And the great lotsāwas Vairotsana, Nyak Jñānakumāra,
text.en-trans: lo chen bairo nyak lo yeshé zhön

text.en: Kawa Paltsek, Chokro Lü’i Gyaltsen
text.en-trans: kawa pal tsek chok ro lü gyaltsen

text.en: And Zhang Nanam Yeshe De, to you we pray!
text.en-trans: zhang tön nanam nam la solwa dep

text.en: Rinchen Zangpo, Ngok Loden Sherab,
text.en-trans: rinchen zangpo loden sherab dang

text.en: Dromtönpa Gyalwe Jungne and all the other powerful masters of speech,
text.en-trans: drom tön la sok mawé wangchuk té

text.en: Countlesslotsāwasof earlier and later times,
text.en-trans: lotsa nga chi drang yé namtar gyi

text.en: Bringing to mind your kindness, we pray to you from the depths of our hearts!
text.en-trans: kadrin drenpé nying né solwa dep

text.en: In this age of the five degenerations, people like us merely feign a pure motivation.
text.en-trans: dak chak nga dö gang zak lhak sam kül

text.en: Now, as we translate into our own regional languages
text.en-trans: gyalwé ka ten kunjung drenpa dang

text.en: The expressing words and the meaning conveyed in the statements of the Buddha,
text.en-trans: katub rigché wang gyur tekpa chok

text.en: The teachings of the vehicles leading from the origin, Vedic asceticism and supreme and powerful transformative methods,1
text.en-trans: khyepar rigpa dzinpé dé nö dé

text.en: And especially those of thepiṭakaof vidyādharas,
text.en-trans: ka ter dak nang tsa sum chökyong gi

text.en: The teachings ofkama,termaand pure visions,
text.en-trans: sungrab yul lung so sö ké yig tu

text.en: And those related to the Three Roots and the dharmapālas,
text.en-trans: jö ché dra dang jö ché dön gyur la

text.en: May we be free from adverse circumstances and hindrances, and may all our pure aspirations be accomplished!
text.en-trans: galkyen barché mé ching sam gu drup

text.en: In keeping with the wishes of the great lotsāwas and paṇḍitas of the past,
text.en-trans: ngön chön lo pen nam kyi tuk kyé zhin

text.en: May we bring benefit to the teachings of the Buddha and to all beings,
text.en-trans: ten dang drowa yong la men né ni

text.en: And may the precious Buddhadharma spread throughout the world,
text.en-trans: dzam bu ling du gyal ten rinpo ché

text.en: Developing like the waxing moon, and bringing auspiciousness to all!
text.en-trans: yar ngö dawé kun khyab trashi shok
